artist: Author: Ayun Halliday; Publisher: Ayun Halliday , New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical text, figural illustration, and two photographic images of a mother and her two children printed in offset lithography on wove paper covers; 36 pp.
title: The East Village Inky, no. 11
